entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:25 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
